technology.short_description: Magically enchanted bones provide the undead hordes more resistance against mundane implements.

effects.description: Armour: +5 for Returned units
Speed: +12% for Returned and Unearthed Laborers units

technology.short_description: There's no way a man without a mind should be able to wield a weapon effectively, but he can, with supernatural help.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +6% for Returned and Unearthed Laborers units
Melee Attack: +3 for Undead Infantry and Cavalry

technology.short_description: In the colorless abode of the dead, maniacal laughter echoes amidst the anguished screams and frantic wailing.

effects.description: Attribute: "Perfect Vigour" for Mogwai units

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

effects.description: Bonus vs Infantry: +6 for Mogwai units

technology.short_description: Also known as the Tome of Bone, this dread volume, authored by Arkhan the Black, is filled with his secrets for instilling vigour and other deathly abilities into zombified and skeletal vessels.

effects.description: Upkeep: -20% for Returned and Unearthed Laborers units
Melee attack: +3 for Chanters, Returned, Unearthed Laborers, and Revenants units

technology.short_description: A single-word boon, spoken during the ritual, will harden the skin of corpses as they jerk back to life.

effects.description: Leadership: +4 for Returned and Unearthed Laborers units

technology.short_description: Speaking this Dark Magic mantra will bring forth yet more skeletal remains.

effects.description: Vigour loss reduction: +12% for Returned and Unearthed Laborers units
Replenishment rate: +8% for Returned and Unearthed Laborers units

technology.short_description: Summoning long-lost warriors to join your shambling dead boosts the yearning hordes' capable champions.

effects.description: Recruit Rank: +3 for Undead Infantry and Cavalry
Hero recruit rank: +4 for Jiangjun Revenant
Leadership: +6 for Revenants and Youxia units

technology.short_description: For centuries, this tome of beasts has been required reading for Necromancers who wish ultimate control, training and mastery of the dread creatures that lurk by the graveside.

effects.description: Leadership: +5 for Fell Bats and Gore Hags units

technology.short_description: The darker and more haunted the forests become, the better the habitat for fell creatures.

effects.description: Recruitment cost: -15% for Fell Bats and Gore Hags units
Upkeep: -10% for Fell Bats and Gore Hags units

technology.short_description: Misshapen figures in the guise of a parody of a woman; their cruel knives and cleavers clinking in sadistic anticipation.

effects.description: Passive ability: "The Hunger" for Gore Hags units
Speed: +10% for Gore Hags units
Weapon strength: +7% for Gore Hags units

technology.short_description: The Mogwai are dreaded, diabolical creatures of the nether who exist, supposedly, to deliver judgment upon men of great sin.

effects.description: Recruitment cost: -20% for Mogwai units
Upkeep: -15% for Mogwai units

technology.short_description: Wherever the Yaoguai and its nether-kin go, the darkness follow, and in turn they instinctively seek to envelop all the world in shadow.

effects.description: Upkeep: -15% for Yaoguai units
Speed: +8% for Yaoguai units

technology.short_description: The Yaoguai are perhaps the most hateful and abominable creatures that have traversed from the dark realm of the dead.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +9 for Yaoguai units
Attribute: "Stalk" for Yaoguai units

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

technology.short_description: The necromancer visits recent sites of battle, perusing the strewn corpses for fresh puppets to reanimate.

effects.description: Recruitment cost: -25% for Returned and Unearthed Laborers units
Upkeep: -15% for Returned and Unearthed Laborers units

technology.short_description: The armour many soldiers are buried with is brought back to the surface - a gift from the grave.

effects.description: Leadership: +4 for Returned and Unearthed Laborers units
Melee defense: +6 for Returned and Unearthed Laborers units

technology.short_description: A small cantrip can locate ancient blades upon an ancient battlefield long thought lost to time.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +14% for Revenants and Youxia units

technology.short_description: To become Master of Swarms is to dominate each creature within the flock, so they sway to his control.

effects.description: Armour: +20 for Fell Bats units
Melee defence: +5 for Fell Bats units
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +1 for Fell Bats units

technology.short_description: Beasts that are already blooded, that know the thrill of hunting living things, will always be the superior breed.

effects.description: Recruit rank: +2 for units from the Forest building chain

technology.short_description: Evil spirits and dark denizens of the nether realm harbor great desire in toying with the feeble and fragile psyche of men.

effects.description: Enables charmed attacks for Devil of Dark Omen units
Ward Save: +10% for Devil of Dark Omen units

technology.short_description: The coming of death isn't necessarily a disadvantage, and can even prove the most special of boons.

effects.description: Attribute: "Charge Defense" for Returned and Unearthed Laborers units

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

effects.description: Melee defense: +4 for Returned and Unearthed Laborers units

technology.short_description: The necromancer invokes an ancient rite, momentarily forcing the risen dead to remember their last agonizing moments; rousing them to awaken in fury en masse.

effects.description: Recruitment cost: -30% for Revenants and Youxia units
Upkeep: -15% for Revenants and Youxia units

technology.short_description: The dread animator can wake the most stubborn of ancient warriors from their deathly slumber.

effects.description: Attribute: "Perfect Vigour" for Revenants and Youxia units

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

effects.description: Speed: +12% for Revenants and Youxia units

technology.short_description: Even in death, those who waged rebellion against authority still possess that spark of defiance in their withered husks.

effects.description: Attribute: "Rampage" for Unearthed Laborers units

related_attributes.bullet_text: When this unit gets hurt it may go on a rampage against nearby enemy units, attacking the closest one and ignoring any orders given.

effects.description: Missile damage: +12% for Unearthed Laborers units

technology.short_description: "...And  so did the hero Zhu Ba, led astray by vanity and glory, betray the people of Liao to the Tyrant of the Mountain, thus earning their eternal hatred."

effects.description: Weapon strength: +15% for Hungry Ghost units
Attribute: "Causes Terror" for Hungry Ghost units

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

technology.short_description: Tyrants and hegemon-kings in their rotten, past lives, the Starved Marquises' insatiable greed will seek to devour even the world if possible.

effects.description: Bonus vs Large: +9 for Starved Marquis units
Passive Ability: "Frenzy" for Starved Marquis units

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

technology.short_description: Unseeable and unknowable, the enigmatic Pale Ladies that haunt and lurk within cursed dwellings and old battle sites are dread incarnate.

effects.description: Barrier health +400 for Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
Weapon damage: +12% for Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
Attribute: "Devastating Flanker" for Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units

related_attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute double their charge bonus when attacking the rear or flank of an entity.

technology.short_description: As the industry of Undeath grows, so do the dwellings of its Dark Lords. It is blood that drives this dread economy.

effects.description: Growth: +15
Income from all buildings: +20%

technology.short_description: The Jade-Blooded Vampires and their deathless hosts have long been the source of spooks and terrors in the grand orient for an accursed millenia.

effects.description: Attrition: -12% casualties suffered from non-Vampiric territory attrition
Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Cathay
Leadership: +5 when laying siege or encircling

technology.short_description: Jiangshi are somewhat stubborn, if fickle, corpse automatons. With stronger seals and ample sorcery, a necromancer may control one such monster with greater ease.

effects.description: Recruit rank: +3 for Jiangshi units
Leadership: +9 for Jiangshi units
Speed: +12% for Jiangshi units

technology.short_description: As its dark empire rots, the Midnight Aristocracy clings to pride and the fineries of nobility ever more strongly.

effects.description: Armour-piercing weapon damage: +16% for Cursed Jade Carriage units
Charge bonus: +10 for Cursed Jade Carriage units

technology.short_description: A text of powerful binding and one of the nine Books of Nagash. It contains countless rituals to ensnare wrathful spirits, summon ghoulish creatures and imbue such fell things with dread power.

effects.description: The Dead Rise Again: +5% hit points for destroyed units restored after battle
Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from non-Vampiric territory attrition

technology.short_description: One might expel spirits from this realm, but one should also be wary that not all exorcisms are perfect. As long something anchors them to this world, be it a memento or a violent memory, they will always return.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate +9% for Hungry Ghost units
Leadership: +4 for Hungry Ghost units

technology.short_description: This incantation quickens the pace of the hordes over great distances. Forever marching, never tiring.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +10%
Battle reinforcement time: -50%

technology.short_description: "Clad in pristine snow-white gowns and their faces obscured by sheets of cloth, they came by my bedside with apparatuses of steel and bronze...the angels of death."

effects.description: Barrier health +300 for Sanatorium Staff and Patients units
Recruit rank: +3 for Sanatorium Staff units
Speed: +15% for Sanatorium Staff and Patients units

technology.short_description: Said to be transcribed from scrolls of Neferata herself, this grave codex instructs recently-sired Vampires in the art of infiltrating, influencing and spreading the Vampiric curse across the world.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +15 with Vampire Coast and Vampire Counts
Growth: +10

technology.short_description: Even as wraiths and revenants, some of the Cathayan dead still never forget the worship of their Dragon lords.

effects.description: Control: +4
Diplomatic relations: +12 with Grand Cathay

technology.short_description: The Vampires' baleful rituals are enacted to ensure the spread of Undeath.

effects.description:
Vampiric corruption: +2
	(all provinces)

technology.short_description: The tenets of Lahmia encourage Vampires to inveigle themselves into the mortal populace.

effects.description: Allegiance points gained: +25%

technology.short_description: As a Vampire grows in dark majesty, others of evil intent will flock to this master, for they also crave power.

effects.description: Hero recruit rank: +2 for Jade-Blooded Courtesan
Passive Ability: "Frenzy" for Blood Lions units

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

effects.description: Melee attack: +6 for Blood Lions units

technology.short_description: Pulling all the strings, his puppets are willing tools, ready to be used at their master's command.

effects.description: [HIDDEN - do not translate] Used to increase lord rank when replacing a lord (target the effect at forces factionwide) - use in conjunction with a shown effect that targets provinces factionwide
Lord recruit rank: +2
Hero action cost: -33%
Hero recruitment cost: -33%
Leadership: +10 for Lords and embedded Heroes

technology.short_description: Using a litany from a language not spoken for generations, the speaker can bind malevolent spirits to his cause.

effects.description: Recruitment cost: -20% for Wild Ghosts units
Upkeep: -60% for Wild Ghosts units

technology.short_description: The ghosts of the slain have nothing but sheer disgust and loathing upon those that survived them.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +20% for Wild Ghosts units
Barrier health +200 for Wild Ghosts units

technology.short_description: Dubbed the Horse-Faced and Ox-Headed guardians of the afterlife, these otherworldly titans are as implacable as their immense size suggest.

effects.description: Barrier health +500 for Underworld Gate Guardian units
Melee attack: +4 for Underworld Gate Guardian units
Melee defense: +6 for Underworld Gate Guardian units

technology.short_description: Channelers convene at blasphemous circles, when Morrslieb is at ascendancy, to bear witness with grim spirits, and other far darker entities of otherworldly origin.

effects.description: Hero recruit rank: +2 for Channeler
Hero recruit rank: +2 for NÃ¼ Gui
Winds of magic cost: -2 to "Call From the Beyond"
Winds of magic cost: -4 to "Call From the Beyond Upgraded"

technology.short_description: Some Vampires are masters of disguise, using their charm and magic to infiltrate powerful organisations and noble houses.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +10 with all factions

technology.short_description: Just as dark magic courses through the blighted land of Nongchang, so do the winds of magic blow ever strongly; perfect for conducting ceremonies of the occult.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve minimum: +8
Research rate: +12%

technology.short_description: Sealed and forbidden texts found deep inside Weng-Chang's most sacred vaults, shunned even by its monk guardians, mention the secrets to immortality and the domination of life itself.

effects.description: Replenishment rate: +40% for  Lords and  Heroes
Upkeep: -33% for  Lords and  Heroes
